#include<iostream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<math.h>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long t,n,x,y,i;
    scanf("%lld", &t);
    scanf("%lld", &n);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld", &x, &y);
        long long ex,ans;
        x=x%n;
        ex=pow(x,y);
        ans=ex%n;
        printf("%lld\n", ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
